name: Skirsdag Flayer
originalText: {3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Human: Destroy target creature.

rulings.text: You can sacrifice any Human you control, including Skirsdag Flayer itself.
Because targets are chosen before costs are paid, you can activate Skirsdag Flayer’s ability targeting itself and then sacrifice Skirsdag Flayer to pay the cost.

text: {3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Human: Destroy target creature.
